# Next.js Portfolio with Aceternity UI

## Project Overview

A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Aceternity UI components.

## Completed Steps

✅ Created copilot-instructions.md file
✅ Scaffolded Next.js project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
✅ Installed Aceternity UI dependencies (Framer Motion, clsx, tailwind-merge)
✅ Created Aceternity UI components (BackgroundGradient, TextGenerateEffect, Lamp, HoverBorderGradient)
✅ Built portfolio sections (Hero, About, Projects, Contact)
✅ Successfully compiled and built the project

## Project Structure

- `/app` - Next.js app directory with pages and layouts
- `/components` - React components for portfolio sections
- `/components/ui` - Aceternity UI components
- `/lib` - Utility functions

## Next Steps

To customize your portfolio:

1. Update personal information in components/Hero.tsx
2. Add your skills in components/About.tsx
3. Add your projects in components/Projects.tsx
4. Update contact links in components/Contact.tsx
5. Modify metadata in app/layout.tsx
